scripts.cover: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx nyc --reporter=lcov npm t
scripts.prepare-patch-release: npm run update-changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "Updated changelog" && npm version patch
scripts.publish-patch-release: npm run prepare-patch-release && git push origin master && git push --tags
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx mocha --require ts-node/register --extensions ts,tsx test/* --exclude=test/data/* --test
